title: Venison Chilli with Tequila
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1.35kg minced venison', '2 sticks celery, diced', '475g chopped onion', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies', '1 tablespoon garlic granules', '4 tablespoons chilli powder', '4 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '450g passata', '125ml gold tequila', '125ml orange juice', '2 (420g) tins chilli beans in sauce']
